content:
As an AI language model, I don't have the ability to know SWIFT's exact plans for future developments or how the pandemic has impacted them. However, it is certain that the pandemic has forced SWIFT to shift its priorities, re-evaluate its strategies, and accelerate its plans in some areas.

For example, with the increased demand for digital services, SWIFT has placed more emphasis on developing its digital capabilities and expanding its electronic services. The company has stated that it will continue to invest in its digital platforms, such as SWIFT gpi, and will work towards maximizing its value for its customers.

The pandemic has also highlighted the need for greater resilience and security in financial systems, and SWIFT has been focusing on enhancing these aspects of its network. The company has introduced new security measures and regulations, such as the Customer Security Programme (CSP), and has emphasized the importance of cybersecurity in maintaining the stability of the financial system.

Moreover, SWIFT has been exploring new technologies such as blockchain, cloud computing, and APIs, to provide better services and create new value for its customers. These efforts are expected to continue to support the company's future growth and expansion plans.

Overall, while the pandemic has undoubtedly affected SWIFT's plans for future developments and expansion, the company appears to be adapting and leveraging technology to ensure it maintains its position as a global leader in financial messaging services.
